title: Inference Approaches

definitions.Best-of-N search: generates N complete responses and selects the best one among them.
definitions.Sentence-level Beam Search: generates multiple candidate options for each sentence and chooses the best one.
definitions.Stage-level Beam Search: generates candidates for each reasoning stage (e.g., summary, caption, reasoning, and conclusion) and selects the best option at each stage.

summary: The slide presents three inference approaches in AI: Best-of-N search, Sentence-level Beam Search, and Stage-level Beam Search. Each approach is explained with a brief description and illustrated with diagrams showing the process of generating and selecting responses.
